title: SNAP Transparency Act of 2013
content: SNAP Transparency Act of 2013 - Amends the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture (USDA) to: (1) establish a uniform reporting system to enable retail stores participating in the supplemental nutrition assistance program to collect and provide the Secretary with detailed information on SNAP-purchased food items, and (2) publish such information on the Internet.
